trends: There have been no other sightings in Billings
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: close observation of landed craft possible conecte
divs: Sighting DetailsMr Erdmann, his father and three family friends were camping at their accustomedhunting camp in the breaks of central montana. Their first day there they founda mutilated cow classic in its bloodless, clean cuts and removal of sexualorgans. Reporting this to the owner they were met with hostility. The next dayreturning in the dark to their camp they saw bright lights in the field and then investigating observed a saucer type craft covered with netting andilluminated with generator lights.The five of them had hunting binoculars andwere able to closely observe "men" removing crates from the craft via a landingramp. The men were dressed in black with black baseball caps.They observed the craft for five minutes and then felt sudden concern for theirsafety and left hurredly. Returning to camp they were adverse to discussion ofthe event and all slept until 09:30 although it was their inevitable custom toarise at 05:00.
